Infectum.turoyo: mə=kibax ya ḥurma əmmo mə=kibi ono mbeli tre ani mbeli ḥa=gawro ... gabayye u=med-ano ġắlabe ko-ṣoʕəb aʕlayye d-šəmʕi hawxa mede ʕal an=nišaṯṯe -
translations: (He said): “What is wrong with you, wife?” – She said: “What is wrong with me? Have I married two husbands or one?” (…) (And for them (these people) it was hard to hear such words from their wives).

tokens.value: mə=kibax ya ḥurma əmmo mə=kibi ono mbeli tre ani mbeli ḥa=gawro

‘(He said): “What is wrong with you, wife?” – She said: “What is wrong with me? Have I married two husbands or one?” (…) (And for them (these people) it was hard to hear such words from their wives).’

Infectum.text: mə=kibax ya ḥurma əmmo mə=kibi ono mbeli tre ani mbeli ḥa=gawro (...) gabayye u=med-ano ġắlabe ko-ṣoʕəb aʕlayye, d-šəmʕi hawxa mede ʕal an=nišaṯṯe ‘(He said): “What is wrong with you, wife?” – She said: “What is wrong with me? Have I married two husbands or one?” (…) (And for them (these people) it was hard to hear such words from their wives).’ 78/29-30
